member.name: PACKET_PROPERTY
member.summary: Describes a packet property that is reported by the tablet driver.

member.name: PACKET_PROPERTY.guid
member.summary: The property. This value is not limited to the set of predefined GUIDs. An application or a device driver may define new GUIDs at any time.

member.name: PACKET_PROPERTY.PropertyMetrics
member.summary: The range, units, and resolution of the packet property.
